text: I feel like I crave deep connection in relationships.
I feel like I crave distance in relationships, preferring to keep people at arm's length.
I can balance my need for closeness with my need for distance in relationships.
I experience conflict between craving deep connection and craving distance.
I can identify my closeness needs and whether I crave deep connection or distance.
I feel like I crave deep connection, but this sometimes conflicts with my need for distance.
I can maintain healthy relationships by balancing my need for closeness with my need for distance.
I experience difficulty in relationships because I crave deep connection or distance, but not both.
I can recognize my closeness needs and work to balance deep connection with appropriate distance.
I feel like my closeness needs (craving deep connection or distance) affect my relationships negatively.
I can identify whether I crave deep connection or distance, and maintain healthy relationships.
I experience relationship problems because I crave deep connection or distance, but struggle to balance both.
I can maintain healthy relationships by understanding my closeness needs and whether I crave deep connection or distance.

I feel like my closeness needs (craving deep connection or distance) interfere with my ability to have healthy relationships.
